commands.description: Create a hierarchy map of a filesystem using node's built-in *fs*.

format.name: format
format.description: used output format (overwritten if the the output path has a json- or yml/yaml-extension)

root-name.name: root-name
root-name.description: the used name for the root-folder

include.name: include
include.description: the included informations in return object

match.name: match
match.description: specify the filter for node names (glob), negate by leading '!', depends on '--filter'

no-empty.name: no-empty
no-empty.description: to filter child nodes that have no children, depends on '--filter'

args.name: path
args.description: path to create a hierarchy from
